name: A Corky
text: Carry out is the way to go with this place. Wings are the best in town per my husband. Unfortunately we also ordered a no crust pan pizza. Dough, sauce and cheese are very good. I just don't understand how you can call this no crust when it looks like the photo I took. Will definitely discuss next time we order.

name: Cynthia Blu
text: Pizza was good, service is good. Nice people

name: david hixson
text: The pizza was good . But finding the place was hard , the sign on the south side of building was not lit up . When I came around the corner I thought they were closed it was so dim lighting even inside . The workers were very nice and fast . I gave 3star because of how hard it was to find , even with GPS

name: Chuck deSully
text: Coming from out of town I was kinda let down it wasn't an eat-in pizza hut. I ordered online and my family ate in our vehicle and it was really good! They had some napkins and paper plates on hand.

name: Dustin Erdman
text: Know the strengths of a restaurant and work within them for the best experience. For this Pizza Hut, their strength is carry-out, so that's all we ever do. …More

name: Joe Edwards
text: I had to say Pizza Hut is a lot better than Domino's Pizza.

name: Brandon Yep
text: It's a nice place for take out pizza. Compared to the Little Ceasers on 9th it a bit dirtier than them however they do send out lots of coupons to get deals on par or better than Little Ceasers. If you got the coupons and make sense to get some pizza, it's not a bad choice.

name: Christopher Bradley
text: I ordered a medium pizza from here for my client. It was at a ridiculously high cost of $16. When we got to his house to enjoy some of the pizza that costed an arm and a leg we noticed that there was a black hair on the pizza. There was an …More

name: roman guenther
text: Da hut has good food

name: Chris Wallachy
text: I followed a delivery driver who sped through a school zone doing 40mph and weaving through cars. She then cut off a jogger who was in a sidewalk. I called the store and had a one sided conversation with a woman who really had a “I can care less” attitude. I’m not sure if she was the manager - but if she was - it was poorly handled.

name: Stuart Pearce
text: So I used to get Pizza Hut in my parent's hometown. The PH there was amazing.  What I ordered here is some of the worst I've ever tasted; 711 counter pizza is better (note: 711 pizza is bad too).  The delivery was right on time at 30 min, …More

name: Derek Stone
text: Okay service. Started off poor, but ended with great service. Pizza is exactly what I expected. Was a fairly clean facility, but didn't check the bathroom. The front door feels like you're going in a side door which is weird, but overall a good experience.

name: Aquatics Spacecraft
text: Very bad found a hair in my pizza they did not refund it when I called they acted like they couldn’t hear me when they did and then I called again and the girl was really rude do not go there never go there worst pizza restaurant in the entire world don’t go there very overpriced and not worth it

name: Tyler Sellers
text: We miss the salad bar. Ranch will never be the same. It doesn't seem like this place cares too much even with the new location. I ordered extra cheese and it didn't seem to extra cheesy. I'm sure they weigh it. But still. Pretty lame. I'm still gonna go back since its cheap and the only pizza hut though.

name: michael bazurto
text: I went in on a hot day, had my dog with me. They couldn't do anything fast. Told them I had my dog in the car and they told me I could wait the 15 minutes in the car with him! I tried to cancel my order right after they charged me but was …More

name: Adrian Henle
text: It's pizza hut

name: Dan St
text: Always good pizza and wings!

name: Brooke Harrington
text: The Totino’s pizza in my freezer has better taste and crust than what I spent $40 on at Pizza Hut tonight. Atmosphere feels dark and dirty. Never again.

name: Rob Bennett
text: Prompt delivery, enjoyed the hand tossed supreme.

name: Joseph Brandon
text: Pizza is great.  Wings are really good. Problem is they don't value me as a customer. Since they moved they shortened their delivery area. I can no longer order from Pizza Hut and have it delivered. That is a huge inconvience. I order from …More

name: Byron B
text: Okay pizza. A little too greasy.

name: shroom man
text: 10/10 best sit-down restaurant

name: Blake Mueller
text: This place is super ghetto. Their food quality is very inconsistent, as well as their service, depending on who is working. More times then not, it is all just pretty bad. Oh, and forget about your order being ready when you arrive to pick …More

name: Keegan
text: They don't have beer the place was disgusting the table and silverware was sticky

name: Anne Butler
text: Pizza was good, friendly staff

name: Jonna Taylor
text:
Went to Pizza Hut this evening, for pizza and beer. What's this? You don't serve beer and wine anymore? Are you serious?
That's the stupidest thing I've heard of today! …More

name: John Downard
text: Thank you Robert for great customer service skills for fixing our pizza pineapple and black olive

name: Sandra Winn
text: Employee's we're very friendly. It wasn't very crowded for us but it seemed like it took a bit of time for our food. We kept the kids entertained with the arcade games. All around a nice time.

name: Bee Stephens
text: I’ve never had a bad experience here. My pizza has 100% been delicious, correct, and on time. It’s a rare thing for a franchise. That’s why I keep coming back.

name: Patricia Kimbrell
text: Half of the restaurant was filled with boxes and upturned chairs. Looked like they were going out of business. No other customers were in the restaurant. Food was ok

name: moorgun nash
text: My favorite pizza nobody out pizzas the hut

name: Charles Newell
text: The assistant manager Alex goes above and beyond to assist his customers

name: E K
text: Went in to get the coupon deal and the kid behind the counter debated everything with me.   Who really cares if it is a square vs a round pizza, the coupon doesn't state it.  I miss the days when it was about the customer and not the kid who just wants to roll his eyes and treat you like you are stupid.

name: Andrea Markus
text: It was horrible. We went to get the lunch buffet, when we got inside the chairs were still up on tops of the tables as if they were closed (it was around 11:50 am) . They don't do the buffet anymore, but they had the salad bar still. The staff were nice but the atmosphere was disappointing.

name: Chase Keeney
text: I thought they would  have gotten better after the other bad reviews, but it was icky. They person deliverying my food was really mean and got super mad at me for not tipping. The food was a bit late. The pizza was very salty and slimmy. …More

name: Trevor Silwones
text: Won't take my order without my phone number which doesn't make sense. In addition to that I called in earlier and asked to get the $10 dinner box and they told me I had to come in to buy it. When I came in they said because they are out of …More

name: Andrea Mykrantz
text: Pizza is good and they have a salad bar.

name: Grant Blake
text: Great pizza, I really enjoy the extra crust flavors and dipping sauces available now. Pan crust is the best way to eat pizza, it's so fluffy and buttery. This location offers a lunch buffet, which is not the case everywhere.

name: Alicia Knight
text: Never had a bad pizza.  Employees are very friendly.  Love the Pan Supreme.  It's always consistently good.

name: Matt Cates
text: Great service, Pizza Hut is a classic

name: John Fortenberry
text: Helpful staff, Good pizza..

name: Kyle Willard
text: Pathetic customer service, clearly poorly trained shift leaders, food quality is complete trash. When you send me BURNED food twice in one week and you are too lazy to cut extremely messy sandwiches I assume that the fact that things are …More

name: Julie Colmenro
text: Delicious☺

name: Amethyst Ames
text: Always mess up our food one way or another. But they are friendly.

name: Paul Skarda
text: Great service and take out pizza is always done on time. Never had a problem with an order and the staff have always been friendly.

name: Linda Conner
text: Salad bar was awful, pizza was cold. Bleh.

name: Dr Mambo
text: This pizzahut knows nothing about customer service.. i use pizzahut because of the rewards program. I used to manage a dominos.. (that should say something.) I made a mistake on the online order and the order was made for delivery to my old …More

name: stephanie nelson
text: Customer service was fantasitc!! Most pizza places wont give me the time of day to accept an odd request. I wanted ranch dressing in place of pizza sauce and although i got a strange look. Lol. They graciously said yes they would be happy too. Everyone was friendly and helpful!

name: Belen h
text: It's good

name: Jake Ryan
text: Took me a number of consecutive bad experiences to finally write this review. This place is awful. Employees blame management and management blames new employees. Don’t expect anything hot for delivery.

name: Marlon Keller
text: Have had good customer service myself. I try to tip drivers who are mostly students each visit if I have it on me. The kids are try to survive in a different dollar value than we did. That could be the difference in smile or frown.

name: sierra 117
text: Order was very late, called and they acted like they didn't even have it... Like really? Usually great pizza, this location is not a good idea.

name: Andrew Fuhriman
text: The pizza here is completely saturated in grease to the point that it's soggy. I ordered ahead of time and I was in and out of the place in under five minutes, but it was long enough to make my clothes smell like grease. Some of the worst pizza I've ever eaten.

name: kayla
text: Been ordering here since 2006-ish always comes to my house around 30 to 50 mins after my order is placed, great service :)

name: nicole mcmillen
text: Thanks pizza hut for delivering an hour late, forgetting about our order entirely, then us having to call and remind you, after we already paid of course, putting onions on our taco pizza after we said no onions then bringing us a cold …More

name: Fiona Dennis
text: Great tasty pizza but slow service.

name: Mitchell Klotter
text: Thinking pizza? Think again, hot wings are the way to go at Pizza Hut especially on their 'wing Wednesday' on which they offer 50¢ wings!!

name: ZAR AK
text: Simply pathetic service. They were really not in a mood to retain their customers. There was a french beard guy who literally doing worst job for pizza hut by implicitly showing that he does not care for the customers.  Do not go there.

name: Maggie Shirazi
text: Very disappointed. Ordered one pepperoni pizza that came with one pepperoni. Called Pizza Hut and they hung up on me. Terrible service

name: Daniel Foster
text: Thanks for the cold pizza delivered 20 min after the "90" min delivery estimate. I understand if your busy it will take longer but at least deliver a quality product.

name: Bomb Shell
text: i lov pizza hut ever sents i was teen i grew up and old with this company lov it

name: melissa Lyon
text: Pizza Hut has the best pizza and the best prices

name: Brandon Teem
text: Quick service, but when you are an employee gossiping about another employee and using profanity in the kitchen while the whole restaurant can hear you is not ok. He only said "sorry Man, I was actually talking about... nevermind" when I …More

name: Brian M-H
text: Pizza was cold and they only gave me half my order of bread sticks... plus, the place after dark looks super sketchy.

name: Schylur Edelman
text: This was absolutely terrible. I placed an order at 6:20 pm, it wasn't delivered until 8:00 pm- it was wrong. They went back to correct it and came back at 9:12 pm, and asked us to pay an extra $22.00. The Pizza Hut in my hometown was always so good and I keep trying this, and it just is terrible.

name: Alex Weron
text: Great Pizza and awesome deals.

name: Justin Gilmore
text: Pizza hut in general the food is cheap

name: Brandy Syverson
text: Nice restaurant, friendly staff

name: Joshua Keihl
text: It's Pizza Hut, so you know what you're getting.  Sometimes they have some great deals.

name: Wayne Workman
text: Won’t honor online prices over the phone or at restaurant.  So much for marketing!

name: Jordan Mitts
text: They quoted me a 45 minute delivery time, took an hour and fifteen, told me they'd credit me for a free pizza next time... Instead they credited me for $5. Argh.

text: Gross

text: (Translated by Google) Although the food is delicious, my roommate was consumed by a small brother for $80, and the attitude was average. Bad review! …More
